idea-plugin.name: Free Colorflow Brackets
idea-plugin.description:
Free Bracket Colorer

A completely free alternative to Rainbow Brackets - Colors nested curly braces {} based on nesting depth.

  • Universal Support: Works with C#, Java, Kotlin, and all supported languages
  • 6 Color Levels: Handles deeply nested code structures
  • Customizable: Set your own colors in Settings → Editor → Color Scheme → Free Bracket Colorer
  • 100% Free: No subscriptions, no limitations

Perfect for C# developers frustrated with paid bracket colorizers!
